sectionDescriptions.sectionOne: It is essential for any team to have a firmly established identity and purpose. High performing teams have a clear identity and this is often highly visible within the team's workspace itself. To function well teams need to understand their purpose and make their purpose known to other teams. High performing teams often have a mission statement and work to a shared vision making it clear to other teams exactly what the team does.

sectionOne.amber: Team workspace may not clearly reflect team identity
Purpose emerging but not made known

sectionOne.red: No shared vision or mission statement
sectionOne.amber: Partial shared vision or mission statement
sectionOne.green: Shared vision / mission statement established and communicated

sectionTwo.amber: Team members confirmed but some still working on other teams
sectionTwo.green: Team members confirmed and all working for team
